item.title: The trailer for ‘MY BIG FAT GREEK WEDDING 3’ has been released.

item.title:
The first trailer for ‘FOUNDATION’ season 2 has been released.
It debuts on Apple TV* on July 14.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: The trailer for iCarly season 3 has been released.

item.title: Ryan Gosling and Cillian Murphy have called ‘BARBIE’ and ‘OPPENHEIMER’ the best scripts they have ever read respectively.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
The first trailer for Yorgos Lanthimos’ ‘POOR THINGS’ has been released.
Only in theaters September 8, 2023.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Due to Emmy rules, Dacre Montgomery is the only ‘STRANGER THINGS’ actor eligible for Emmys this year.

item.title:
“If I could cast Cillian [Murphy] in every film I ever do, and just lean on him for the rest of my career, I'd be a happy man.” — Christopher Nolan.
